amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce total funds authorized in this Act by $60 Billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to reduce total funds authorized in this Act by $60 Billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 71 - 353 (Roll no. 232).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
